snippet.title: Battlefield 1 Revolution Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Revolutionize Your Play - Battlefield 1 Revolution is the complete Battlefield 1 experience, including base game, Premium Pass, and more. Experience dynamic team-based multiplayer battles and epic single-player War Stories across Europe and beyond. In September, the battles comes to the largest front of World War I in the most extensive Battlefield expansion so far, Battlefield 1 In the Name of the Tsar.

Available now for Xbox One, Playstation 4 and Origin: http://x.ea.com/34841 

Subscribe and be the first to see BF1 trailers and videos: http://bit.ly/270eMcA

"Revolution"
Performed By The Score
Written By Edan Dover, Eddie Ramirez, Derek Fuhrmann, Todd Clark and Serena Ryder
Published By Dover Songs and  Eddie Anthony Publishing/Position Music Publishing, Egg Songs Publishing  and A E Fuhrmann Publishing /Downtown Music Publishing and Irving Music Inc.
Recording courtesy of Republic Records
